comments: This figurate number representing hexagram frames. Geometrically, the sequence is analogous to the expanding perimeters of triangles (A008486), squares (A008574), pentagons (A008706), and hexagons (A008458), but in relation to the hexagram lattice.  See the illustrations in the example below. - _Peter M. Chema_, Mar 28 2016
